pullRequest.title: WFLY-13099 Standard configuration files for MicroProfile use cases

                     <execution>
+                        <id>microprofile-standalone-provisioning</id>
+                        <goals>
+                            <goal>provision</goal>
+                        </goals>
+                        <phase>compile</phase>
+                        <configuration>
+                            <install-dir>${layers.install.dir}/microprofile-standalone</install-dir>
+                            <record-state>false</record-state>
+                            <log-time>${galleon.log.time}</log-time>
+                            <offline>true</offline>
+                            <plugin-options>
+                                <jboss-maven-dist/>

+                            </plugin-options>
+                            <feature-packs>

+                                    <name>standalone.xml</name>
+                                    <layers>

+                                        <layer>microprofile-fault-tolerance</layer>

afterCommit.message:
[WFLY-13099] For testsuite/integration/smoke when -Dts.standalone.microprofile is used disable galleon provisioning of the server to test and instead use the more typical approach of copying needed content from jboss.dist

Also, prune some cruft from testsuite/integration/web/pom.xml

beforeCommit.message:
[WFLY-13099] For testsuite/integration/smoke when -Dts.standalone.microprofile is used disable galleon provisioning of the server to test and instead use the more typical approach of copying needed content from jboss.dist

Also, prune some cruft from testsuite/integration/web/pom.xml

afterCommit.message:
[WFLY-13099] For testsuite/integration/smoke when -Dts.standalone.microprofile is used disable galleon provisioning of the server to test and instead use the more typical approach of copying needed content from jboss.dist

Also, prune some cruft from testsuite/integration/web/pom.xml

commit.message: [WFLY-13099] Add standard standalone-microprofile.xml and standalone-microprofile-ha.xml configs
[WFLY-13099] Run the MP TCKs against standalone-microprofile.xml
[WFLY-13099] By default run testsuite/integration/microprofile against standalone-microprofile.xml

[WFLY-13099] Add to basic testsuite a surefire execution of a subset of tests against standalone-microprofile.xml

Add a profile such that this is only enabled via -Dts.standalone.microprofile

Share the set of included/excluded tests with one of the -Dts.layers executions that produces a similar config
[WFLY-13099] Add to smoke and web testsuites a surefire execution of a subset of tests against standalone-microprofile.xml
[WFLY-13099] Add to clustering testsuite a surefire execution of a subset of tests against standalone-microprofile-ha.xml
[WFLY-13099] Correct testsuite/integration web handling of ts.standalone.microprofile
[WFLY-13099] Use full.maven.groupId/version for Galleon configurations added after WFLY-13137

[WFLY-13099] For testsuite/integration/smoke when -Dts.standalone.microprofile is used disable galleon provisioning of the server to test and instead use the more typical approach of copying needed content from jboss.dist

Also, prune some cruft from testsuite/integration/web/pom.xml
